item.description: The air is crisp and the leaves are starting to change. If you'd like to visit the club and check out what the White Mountains and North Conway has to offer in the fall, this is a great weekend. This meetup starts Friday, October 5th and ends Sunday, October 7th . There are a lot of things going on in the valley this weekend: Attitash Oktoberfest, Maine's Fryeburg Fair, a hike somewhere with great views of the whites, and some fun stuff for Sat afternoon/ evening. Full break down on cost will be sent to all “Yes” RSVPs. Non-members: $15 per night lodging fee Sat dinner at the club: $10 All members/ guests must be 21+ Hope to see you up!
item.how_to_find_us: We will send directions and details to all "yes" RSVPs
item.name: Columbus Day Weekend at the Bretts
